html:
The Canon USA refurbished sale on Canon EOS R and RF gear still has some great deals left. Most of the lenses on sale have sold out, but some of the camera body deals are still available.

Cameras like the EOS R6 and EOS RP are still great for most shooters. I personally use the EOS R6 for underwater shooting, and would have no problem using the EOS RP for the same thing.

Full Frame EOS R Cameras

  • Canon EOS R5 $2399 (Reg $3399)
  • Canon EOS R6 Mark II $1799 (Reg $2299)
  • Canon EOS R6 $1099
  • Canon EOS RP $549

Canon USA offers a full 1-year Canon USA warranty on all refurbished gear. Canon USA also offers free standard USA shipping.

We think that this will be the last refurbished sale with larger discounts for a while.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
